short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage your contacts using lists and use them on Gmail with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- Create lists giving the proper name
- Insert emails on your lists
- Use the list easily on compose form

Changelog:
2.0.1 Added Cc and Bcc support
2.0.0 Updated extension UI
1.0.4 Added Inbox support
